塙字的基本解释

塙
què
同“确”。

塙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［què］
［《廣韻》苦角切，入覺，溪。］
亦作“墧1”。“確1”的古字。
(1)土质坚硬。
(2)确切。

塙字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　塙； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页236第01
【廣韻】【集韻】?克角切，音埆。土高也。一曰土堅不可拔也。　又【集韻】丘交切，音敲。磽也。墽墝??同。

塙字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
塙字的起名意思

暂无。

塙
Basic explanation of words
塙
què
Same as "true".
塙
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［què］
["Guangyun" bitter angle cut, enter into sleep, stream. ]
Also known as "墧1". The ancient character of "Qing 1".
(1) The soil is hard.
(2) Exactly.
塙
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　塙; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 236, 01
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Kejiao cut, sound 埆. The soil is high. One said that the soil is inextricably strong.　 [Ji Yun] Qiu crosses and cuts, sound knocks. Qiao also.墽硗?? The same.
